1. Mage: Mage is a versatile hero that can adapt to different game scenarios. They are strong at dealing with minions and spells, which makes them great for beginners. 2. Hunter: Hunter is an aggressive hero featuring quick and aggressive decks, which makes them good at rushing down opponents. They are relatively easy to play and great for fast-paced gameplay. 3. Paladin: Paladin has a mix of defensive and offensive capabilities, which makes them a well-rounded choice for new players. They have some strong minions and spells that can impact the board and provide a decent defense also. 4. Druid: Druid is a versatile hero that features both aggressive and defensive capabilities, which makes them an excellent choice for new players. Their minions and spells have a wide range of abilities, from board control to direct damage. 5. Warlock: Warlock is an interesting hero that uses their own Life totals to draw cards and summon demons, giving players a rich variety of cards for every situation. They are relatively tricky to play but can be rewarding if played correctly. Remember, choose a hero that suits your preferences and play-style, so give each hero a try to see which one you enjoy the most.
